articles.description: The new strain, scientists say, is carried by pigs but can infect humans and requires close monitoring.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The new flu strain is similar to the swine flu that spread globally in 2009
A new strain of flu that has the potential to become a pandemic has been identi… [+3741 chars]
